players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Alice was the first one to be killed. Let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to uncover any suspicious behavior."
You: "I'm the mafioso and I killed Alice last night. Keep an eye on each other, but don't jump to conclusions just yet."
Diana: "I'm concerned about the sudden turn of events and believe it's important that we all remain vigilant. Let's keep an open dialogue and share any suspicions or concerns we may have."

Charlie: "I'm shocked by the turn of events and I believe it's important that we all remain open and honest with each other. Let's work together to uncover any suspicious behavior and bring the killer to justice."
